**Information on this site is frequently changed without any notification**. 


**CalgaryR**  is the group for R users in Calgary.    This group aims to get researchers together from both industry and academia in order to share experience and expertise for various statistical and analytical works using R.   **[Chel Hee Lee](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gnustats/){target="_blank"}**, **[Marc Boulet](https://www.linkedin.com/in/marc-boulet-5bb87023/){target="_blank"}**, **[Cliff Sobchuk](https://www.linkedin.com/in/cliff-sobchuk/){target="_blank"}**, **[Sonbol Yazdanbakhsh](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sonbol-yazdanbakhsh-ph-d-99502735/){target="_blank"}**, **[Laura Keating](https://www.linkedin.com/in/laurakeating/){target="_blank"}** and **[Nima Safaian](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nimasafaian/){target="_blank"}** are volunteered to organize events.   If you are interested in sponsoring our group or hosting a meeting, please contact one of organizers.  Feedback or question via [email to Chel](mailto:imstatsbee@gmail.com) is of course most appreciated.   Please join our [Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/Calgary-R-User-Group/){target="_blank"} and  [public workspace on Slack](https://yyc-r.slack.com/){target="_blank"}.
